channel.name: xfce4-keyboard-shortcuts
channel.property:
<property name="F1" type="string" value="xfce4-popup-applicationsmenu"/> <property name="F2" type="string" value="xfrun4"/> <property name="F2/startup-notify" type="bool" value="true"/> <property name="F3" type="string" value="xfce4-appfinder"/> <property name="F3/startup-notify" type="bool" value="true"/> <property name="Print" type="string" value="xfce4-screenshooter -w"/>
<property name="Delete" type="string" value="xfce4-session-logout"/> <property name="Escape" type="string" value="xkill"/> <property name="f" type="string" value="exo-open --launch FileManager"/> <property name="l" type="string" value="xflock4"/> <property name="t" type="string" value="exo-open --launch TerminalEmulator"/> <property name="Escape" type="string" value="xfce4-popup-whiskermenu"/> <property name="Escape" type="string" value="xfce4-taskmanager"/>
<property name="Print" type="string" value="xfce4-screenshooter -r"/> <property name="e" type="string" value="exo-open --launch FileManager"/> <property name="f" type="string" value="exo-open --launch FileManager"/> <property name="F1" type="string" value="xfce4-find-cursor"/> <property name="l" type="string" value="xflock4"/> <property name="m" type="string" value="exo-open --launch MailReader"/> <property name="p" type="string" value="xfce4-display-settings --minimal"/> <property name="r" type="string" value="xfrun4"/> <property name="r/startup-notify" type="bool" value="true"/> <property name="t" type="string" value="exo-open --launch TerminalEmulator"/> <property name="w" type="string" value="exo-open --launch WebBrowser"/>
